Detailed Description

Adaptor allowing reorderable list control to interface with list data.

Member Function Documentation

bool FullInspector.Rotorz.ReorderableList.IReorderableListAdaptor.CanDrag ( int  index)

Determines whether an item can be reordered by dragging mouse.

This should be a light-weight method since it will be used to determine whether grab handle should be included for each item in a reorderable list.

Please note that returning a value of false does not prevent movement on list item since other draggable items can be moved around it.

Parameters
indexZero-based index for list element.
Returns
A value of true if item can be dragged; otherwise /c>.

Implemented in FullInspector.Rotorz.ReorderableList.SerializedPropertyAdaptor, FullInspector.Rotorz.ReorderableList.GenericListAdaptor< T >, FullInspector.Modules.Collections.DictionaryAdapter< TKey, TValue >, FullInspector.Modules.Collections.CollectionAdaptor< T >, FullInspector.Modules.Collections.GenericListAdaptorWithDynamicHeight< T >, and FullInspector.Internal.ArrayListAdaptor< T >.

bool FullInspector.Rotorz.ReorderableList.IReorderableListAdaptor.CanRemove ( int  index)

Determines whether an item can be removed from list.

This should be a light-weight method since it will be used to determine whether remove button should be included for each item in list.

This is redundant when ReorderableListFlags.HideRemoveButtons is specified.

Parameters
indexZero-based index for list element.
Returns
A value of true if item can be removed; otherwise /c>.

Implemented in FullInspector.Rotorz.ReorderableList.SerializedPropertyAdaptor, FullInspector.Rotorz.ReorderableList.GenericListAdaptor< T >, FullInspector.Modules.Collections.DictionaryAdapter< TKey, TValue >, FullInspector.Modules.Collections.CollectionAdaptor< T >, FullInspector.Modules.Collections.GenericListAdaptorWithDynamicHeight< T >, and FullInspector.Internal.ArrayListAdaptor< T >.
